description:
While Oide Furuya was away from home, a burglar entered the house and killed his father Raita. Conan and Kogoro find the thief, but he insists that he didn`t kill anyone. Kogoro believes the suspicious woman they saw smirking at the Ode family near the train station may have drugged Raita. Meanwhile, Conan questions Furuya`s sister and mother about the day of the incident and notices something strange about the time of death...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: オートマティック悲劇 (後編)
